thread.title: Charming smaller hotel, excellent location on quiet street near Notre Dame
thread.title_full: Charming smaller hotel, excellent location on quiet street near Notre Dame - Review of Relais Hotel du Vieux Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: natourco
title: Charming smaller hotel, excellent location on quiet street near Notre Dame
text:
Friendly staff and nice breakfast in small dining room. Good free internet service in room.
Suggest you contact Hotel direct ( talk with Henri) for any special room offers or upgrades they may have. Plenty of restaurants nearby as well as Museum Cluny and of course Carherdral Notre Dame, which is spectacular. Train station close by to airport. Buy a book of 10 bus/train tickets for 14.50 euro to get around. Gotta see the Opera House !
